title: Cover crop roller 3m
summary: Front tractor-mounted roller system to terminate and/or bruise cover crops ahead of direct drill.

description.descriptionText01: Front tractor-mounted roller system to terminate and/or bruise cover crops ahead of direct drill.

eligibility.eligibiltyBullet02: Roller must have an uneven or ridged surface to aid the crimping or bruising of the cover crop to destroy it.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet03: Roller must completely crimp or bruise the crop across the full working width of the roller.
eligibility.eligibiltyBullet04: Flat rolls and ring rolls are not eligible.
